video.description: Their favorite mindfulness break is back! And their answer… I mean, it’s valid? 😂🥲🤦🏻‍♀️  Every once in a while I can tell my students need a mental break. Yes, we have fun in class constantly with interactive activities to practice and study ASL… Once in a while they need a silly, team building game-class on a Friday. Don’t worry, they were still challenged to search the signs for their individual group answers🤗  #teacher #ReadySetLift #teacherlife #teacherproblems #edutok #classroomoftheelite #lovemyjob #teachertok #teachertiktok #mentalhealthmatters #mentalhealth #mentalhealthawareness #fyp #brainbreak #riddlemethis #riddle #concerned #brainteaser #braingames #mindfulness #gameshow #gamestiktok

challenges.title: MentalHealth
challenges.description: At TikTok, while we value creative expression, our foremost priority is keeping users safe. If you or someone you know is going through a difficult time and needs assistance, please contact local law enforcement or the Suicide Hotline immediately (https://www.tiktok.com/safety/suicide-self-harm/). If you encounter content on TikTok that is concerning, please report the content to bring it to our attention.

entry.transcript: What has to be broken before using it? Did you just say your heart?

Can you... the ball? Sorry? Can you... the ball? Oh, you want me to pass you the ball? Sure. I think it's... deflated? It's deflated, yeah. But I think there is a... a pump. Pump? Yes, there is a pump over there. Can you take it for me? Sure, I'll take it for you. Thank you.

No! No! Oh! Oh, I was safe! This blue one, the nearest blue one to me here. Really? Oh! I'm gonna go for this red one. Oh! I'm actually looking to sign to a new club at the moment. Do I think you've got two O's? No O's, an envelope. Are they clubs? This blue one there. A position. Oh! Oh, I'm gonna go yellow! Yeah. No! Oh my god! I meant that yellow! Can you step over? Yeah, big step. No, no, no, you go around the ball. Oh! No! No! Oh my god, not the right one. Oh! Orange on the end! No! I'm gonna say the red one at the front. Ah! Oh! Oh! Yeah, it's Messi's signature that is. Joe, basketball, orange! Yellow down the middle so it's gonna happen now, isn't it? This blue one here. Okay. No!
